Example:
<text style="letter-spacing:9.02056122px;...">text</text>
 
It looks like "_path.GetBounds().Width" does not return valid width.
Adding 5.2 to the width solved my problem.
 
It might be something similar to this problem:
http://www.codeproject.com/KB/GDI-plus/measurestring.aspx
 
File: SvgText.cs
-----------------
location = new PointF(_path.GetBounds().Width + 5.2f + start + letterSpacing, location.Y);
-----------------
 
I know this is not completely right solution but it worked for me.
